name: Alpha Sphere: Director's Cut
summary: Alpha Sphere: Director's Cut is a complete overhaul Horror SMW ROM Hack focused on atmosphere and puzzles. You play as Norma, a girl trying to escape a man known as Dr. Andre when she stumbles across an ancient relic. Now she must provide it a new home before the night time passes. There are 5 endings you can get, and many secrets to unravel.
